by.zhukova.uni.db

Class AbstractDAO<T extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.zhukova.uni.db.AbstractDAO<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbiturientDAO, DisciplineDAO, FacultyDAO, UserDAO

    public abstract class AbstractDAO<T extends Entity>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class AbstractDAO is abstract template for data access objects of classes-inheritors of class Entity
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Natallya Zhukova
